abstract: Alabama starts process of appealing Federal District Court Judge Callie V S Granade's ruling that overturned state’s ban on same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: The state on Monday began the process of appealing a federal judge’s decision that overturned the state’s ban on same-sex marriage.
snippet: The state on Monday began the process of appealing a federal judge’s decision that overturned the state’s ban on same-sex marriage.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Alabama: State Will Contest Ruling for Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Alabama: State Will Contest Ruling for Gay Marriage
